title: Hiltl Laden - Feinkost and Vegi-Metzg
description: Store and first vegetarian butchery in Switzerland. Sells specialty foods like house-made veggie cordon bleu and meat alternatives like tempeh, tofu, seitan, and soy. Large selection of vegan wine in addition to various foods like pasta, pesto, spices, health food, coffee and croissant to-go, smoothies, fresh bread and vegan treats for dogs.
